#include <stdio.h>

#define maxN 3001

double f[maxN][maxN];

int main( void ) {
    int N, M;

    while( scanf("%i %i", &N, &M) == 2 ) {
	int n, m;
	
	f[0][0] = 0;
	for( n = 2; n <= N * M; n += 2 ) {
	    f[n][n / 2] = n / 2;
	
	    for( m = n / 2 - 1; m >= 0; m-- ) {
		double prob = 0.0, P;
		
		// probability to discover new people from 
		// different countries
		P  = (n - 2*m) * (n - 2*m - 2);
		P /= (n - m) * (n - m - 1);
		
		if( m + 2 <= n / 2 )
		prob += (1 + f[n][m + 2]) * P;

		// probability to discover only one new person
		P  = (n - 2 * m) * m;
		P /= (n - m) * (n - m - 1); 

		prob += (2 + f[n - 2][m]) * P;
		
		// Probability to call a person which a fellow of him
		// has already been called
		P = (double) m / (n - m);

		prob += (1 + f[n - 2][m - 1]) * P;

		// Probability to call two people from same country
		P = (n - 2*m);
		P /= (n - m) * (n - m - 1);

		prob += (1 + f[n - 2][m]) * P;

		f[n][m] = prob;
	    }
	}
	
	printf("%.4f\n", f[N * M][0]);
    }

    return 0;
} // Please Solve Stand Up
